summary: This module contains unit tests that validate the behavior of AWS Route53 Resolver rule association operations using the Moto library to mock AWS services. It includes tests for creating, associating, disassociating, retrieving, and listing resolver rule associations, as well as handling various error scenarios and invalid inputs.
business_intent: Ensure that the application correctly manages Route53 Resolver rule associations and gracefully handles error conditions, providing confidence in the integration with AWS networking services.
